searchUrl:
<js>
sckey = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(source.key + "search")).select(".page-search").attr("data-id");
java.log(sckey);
body = {
  "body": `name=${key}&tags=&type=3&tt=&page_index=${page}&app=2&searchkey=${sckey}`,
  "headers":{"Referer":source.key},
  "method": "POST"
}
result = source.key + "api/search/list" + "," + JSON.stringify(body);
result;
</js>

exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    'å®Œç»“æ¼«ç”»',
    'è¿è½½æ¼«ç”»'
];
orderby = [
    'wanjie',
    'lianzai'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/${orderby[i]}/index_{{page-1}}.html`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
exploreUrl.push(explore('æœ€æ–°ä¸Šæ¶', `{{Get('url')}}/new_coc.html`, 1, 0.25, false));
title = 'âœ£ã€€ã€€ã€€ã€€ã€€  âœ£  æ ‡ã€€ã€€ç­¾  âœ£  ã€€ã€€ã€€ã€€ã€€âœ£';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
Order = `{{get('order',Get('p'))}}`;
kind = [
'çƒ­è¡€æœºæˆ˜','ç§‘å¹»æœªæ¥','ææ€–æƒŠæ‚š','æ¨ç†æ‚¬ç–‘','æ»‘ç¨½æç¬‘','æ‹çˆ±ç”Ÿæ´»','çº¯çˆ±äººç”Ÿ','ä½“è‚²ç«æŠ€','çº¯æƒ…å°‘å¥³','é­”æ³•å¥‡å¹»','æ­¦ä¾ ç»å…¸'
];
tag = [
'rexue','kehuan','kongbu','xuanyi','gaoxiao','love','danmei','tiyu','chunqing','qihuan','wuxia'
];
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/${tag[j]}/index${Order}_{{page-1}}.html`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 3) < 1 ? 0 : (3 - (kind.length % 3));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.25, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(50, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);
</js>

var User = '';
var Title = '';
var Link = '';
var Intro = '';
user_Check();
var data = [];
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers")).replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
User = Checkwait(User);
if (User == true) {
    if (/wanjie|lianzai|new_coc/.test(baseUrl)) {
        var list = java.getElements('.ar_list_co ul li');
        for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
            name = list[i].text();
            data.push({
                'name': name,
                'author': '',
                'kind': '',
                'word': '',
                'latest': '',
                'intro': '',
                'cover': list[i].select('img').attr('src') + ',{"headers":{"Referer":"' + Get('url') + '/"}}',
                'url': Get('url') + list[i].select('span a').attr('href')
            });
        }
        if (!baseUrl.includes("index")) {
            Data();
        } else {
            var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/index_(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'index_' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
            var next_1 = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(next);
            if (!list[0] || !next_1.select('.ar_list_co ul li')[0]) {
                Data();
            }
        }
    } else {
        var list = java.getElements('.ar_list_co dl');
        for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
            name = list[i].select('h1').text();
            author = list[i].select('.author').text();
            kind = String(list[i].select('.status').text()).replace(/çŠ¶æ€|[ä¸­å·²\s]/g, '') + ',' + String(list[i].select('.time').text()).replace(/æ—¶é—´/, '');
            intro = list[i].select('.info').text();
            data.push({
                'name': name,
                'author': author,
                'kind': kind,
                'word': '',
                'latest': '',
                'intro': intro,
                'cover': list[i].select('img').attr('src') + ',{"headers":{"Referer":"' + Get('url') + '/"}}',
                'url': Get('url') + list[i].select('h1 a').attr('href')
            });
        }
        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/(\d+).html/, function(match, p1) {return (parseInt(p1) + 1) + '.html';}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
        var next_1 = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(next);
        if (!list[0] || !next_1.select('.ar_list_co dl')[0]) {
            Data();
        }
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>

eval(String(source.loginUrl));
(function (e) {
    if (Get('search_TC') == true || e.indexOf('TC') > -1) {
        e = String(java.s2t(e)).replace(/TC/, '');
    }
    java.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "searchkey"), e);
    return Get('url').replace(/www/, 'so') + '/k.php?k=' + e + '&p={{page}}';
}(key));

ruleContent.content:
<js>
if(/netUrl/.test(baseUrl)){
  b = source.getKey();
  url1 = String(baseUrl).replace(/netUrl\//,'');
  page = String(java.ajax(url1)).match(/\(ç¬¬1\/(\d+)é¡µ\)/)[1];
  url2 = String(url1).replace(/(\d+).html/,"$1_"+page+".html");
  url = b+java.ajax(url2).match(/<a href="([^"]+)">ä¸‹ä¸€èŠ‚<\/a>/)[1];
  java.put('url',url);
result=java.ajax(url);
}
result
</js>.RBGsectionThree-content p@textNodes

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
list=[];
base = source.getKey();
lis=java.getElements('section .BCsectionTwo-top-chapter a');
for(i in lis){
	url=lis[i].attr('href');
	/javascript/.test(url)?url='/netUrl'+lis[i-1].attr('href'):url;
	url=base+url;
	list.push({"text":lis[i].text(),"href":url})
}
list
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: $.response.blogInfo.blogNickName||$.response.posts[0].post.blogInfo.blogNickName
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
try{
cookie = cookie.getCookie("https://newsmiss.lofter.com");

lofter = String(cookie).match(/;\s(LOFTER-[^-]+-LOGIN-AUTH)=(.*?);/);

header = {};
header[lofter[1]] = lofter[2];
source.putLoginHeader(JSON.stringify(header));
result;
}catch(e){
	result = result
	}
</js>

ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>
pages=java.get('page');
page=parseInt(pages/500);
url=String(java.get('url'));
list=[];

if(page>6){
page=6
}else{page=page}

for(i=1;i<=page;i++){
list.push(url.replace(/offset=\d+/,'offset='+(parseInt(i)*500)))
}

list
</js>
